summary: Adds a playable Time Lord race, from the show Doctor Who, to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a playable Time Lord race, from the show Doctor Who, to Skyrim. Obviously, this mod is not in the slightest bit lore-friendly, but it sure is a lot of fun.

Time Lords are a humanoid race of aliens from the planet Gallifrey. They have the following abilities:
[list][*][size=2]Shock Resistance - Time Lord blood grants a 50% resistance to lightning-based magic[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Regeneration - Fully restores health and boosts health regeneration for a short time[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Mastery of Time - Time slows at the Time Lord's command for a brief period[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]+10 starting Magicka[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Naturally slightly higher rates of health, stamina, and magicka - particularly health (two hearts and all that, you know)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Gifted in Restoration magic and Lockpicking (+10 starting skill), with minor gifts in Illusion, Speech, Alchemy, Alteration, and Destruction (+5 starting skill)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
The Time Lords are slightly overpowered because... well, they're Time Lords, but I tried not to make them too godmode-y and more like a race that was more or less acceptable to place beside the others. Also, TIME LORDS DO NOT YET HAVE FULL VAMPIRE FUNCTIONALITY. Please do not try to play a vampire Time Lord at this time, because there's a 99.9999% chance it won't work. I'm planning on providing for that at a later date.

Every Time Lord also comes equipped with a Sonic Staff, which has full sonic sound effects. :) It has a Magelight/Calm enchantment on it because I wasn't sure what else to do with it. Might change it later. I can't make it open locks yet, unfortunately - you'll just have to rely on your natural Time Lord lock talents for that.

[/size]There are far superior TARDIS mods out there than anything I could ever hope to do, so if you really want the Doctor Who feel, I'd suggest you go grab one of those. There are two on the Nexus right now, I believe.

[b]WORD OF CAUTION:[/b]Â As I've stated previously, I don't completely know what I'm doing. As always, there may be bugs that I don't know how to fix. I'm not sure how Time Lords will interact with the rest of the world entirely yet, which is why this is very much a beta. Please keep that in mind!
author: Clockwork Grapefruit
